articles.title: iPhone 12 Pro Review - Gadgets 360
articles.description: The iPhone 12 Pro features a stainless steel frame, a LiDAR scanner, a telephoto camera, and Apple’s latest 5G SoC. It’s also much more expensive in India than in the US. Is it worth the premium? Read our review of the iPhone 12 Pro to find out.
